description:
The Web3 ecosystem has witnessed a resurgence in Q2 2024, with the NFT sector in particular experiencing its strongest performance since Q1 2023. According to a DappRadar report, the dapp industry has seen a 40% increase in usage compared to the previous quarter, reaching an impressive 10 million daily Unique Active Wallets (UAW). For software... Read more »

The post Dapp industry reached new heights in Q2 2024 appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Dapp industry reached new heights in Q2 2024
